UAWebViewTools Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UAWebViewTools.h

Overview

The UAWebViewTools provides an interface for webview utility methods.

Tasks

  • + createValidPhoneNumberUrlFromUrl:
  • + webView:shouldStartLoadWithRequest:navigationType:
  • + webView:shouldStartLoadWithRequest:navigationType:message:

Class Methods

createValidPhoneNumberUrlFromUrl:

Transforms a phone number URL into one that UIApplication can handle.

+ (NSURL *)createValidPhoneNumberUrlFromUrl:(NSURL *)url

Parameters

url

A phone number URL.

Return Value

A new, sanitized NSURL instance.

UAWebViewTools.h

performJSDelegateWithData:

Used for farming out JavaScript delegate calls.

+ (void)performJSDelegateWithData:(UAWebViewCallData *)data

Parameters

data

The webview call data.

UAWebViewTools.h

webView:shouldStartLoadWithRequest:navigationType:

Custom URL scheme handling, for app-specific URL navigation and JS delegate call logic.

+ (BOOL)webView:(UIWebView *)wv shouldStartLoadWithRequest:(NSURLRequest *)request navigationType:(UIWebViewNavigationType)navigationType

Parameters

wv

The webview loading the request.

request

The request.

navigationType

An enumeration of UIWebViewNavigationType.

Return Value

YES if the URL should be loaded by the webView, NO otherwise.

Declared In

UAWebViewTools.h

webView:shouldStartLoadWithRequest:navigationType:message:

Custom URL scheme handling, for app-specific URL navigation and JS delegate call logic.

+ (BOOL)webView:(UIWebView *)wv shouldStartLoadWithRequest:(NSURLRequest *)request navigationType:(UIWebViewNavigationType)navigationType message:(UAInboxMessage *)message

Parameters

wv

The webview loading the request.

request

The request.

navigationType

An enumeration of UIWebViewNavigationType.

message

The inbox message associated with the webview.

Return Value

YES if the URL should be loaded by the webView, NO otherwise.
